Smart Power Strip: A power strip with built-in smart technology that can detect which devices are in use and turn off power to the unused outlets to save energy.
Charging Station Power Strip: A power strip with multiple USB ports and lightning ports, designed specifically for charging multiple devices at once.
Multi-Outlet Power Strip with Surge Protector: A power strip with multiple outlets and a built-in surge protector to protect devices from power surges and voltage spikes.
Eco-Friendly Power Strip: A power strip made from eco-friendly materials and designed to be energy efficient, with features such as energy-saving modes and automatic shut-off switches.
Portable Power Strip: A compact and lightweight power strip with multiple outlets and USB ports, designed for use on-the-go for charging devices while traveling or working remotely.
